bio.title: 01. WHO AM I?
bio.p1: Hi, I'm Séb. First and foremost a musician, visual artist, and writer, I've also explored the political world.
bio.p2: I don't choose between red and blue. I take the whole spectrum. Always dressed in warm or neon colors, I wear my energy.
bio.p3: Code is an extension of my art. Whether composing an experimental track, writing a tale, or architecting a web app, I always seek to create something unique and vibrant.
